key.name: extension-version
key.description: Extension version for display in extension preferences.

key.name: status-icons-name-to-hide
key.summary: Array of status icon name to hide.
key.description: An array of strings which denotes the name of status icon to collapse (hide).

key.name: display-raw-icon-obj-name
key.summary: Display the raw status icon object's name.
key.description: This denotes whether to display the raw object's name in the list of icon as well. Could be useful to determine which icon to add.
